In England, in the seven days to 26 August, there were 178,267 new confirmed cases (315.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 August, there were 185,173 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 4% (6,906 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 August is 5,880,134 (10,398.1 cases per 100,000 population).
